paramInformation.label: Basic Set Off Level
paramInformation.description: Basic Set value of off from 0~99

paramInformation.label: Basic Set On Level
paramInformation.description: Basic Set value of on from 0~99

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Battery Time
paramInformation.description: Interval time for auto re-porting battery level

paramInformation.label: Percentage Set Method
paramInformation.description: Dimmer setting method. 0 : auto send command Basic Set after rotating. 1 : send command Basic Set by touching key after rotating

options.label: Auto send command Basic Set after rotating
Send command Basic Set by touching key after rotating

metadata.inclusion:
1. Rotate to area A
2. Press the button three times within 1.5 seconds
metadata.exclusion:
1. Rotate to area A
2. Press the button three times within 1.5 seconds
metadata.reset:
1. Rotate to area A
2. Press and hold the button four times within 1.5 seconds, keeping it held on the 4th press
3. Wait for the red LED to light up for 3 seconds, then turn off
4. Release the button within 2 seconds after the red LED turns off
